channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New-home prices drop to a three-year-low, even as sales improve in 2024
item.description: High mortgage rates weighed on new-home sales, which increased 2.5% from 2023 to 2024.

item.title: Why ‘prosocial AI’ must be the framework for designing, deploying and governing AI
